item.title: Jason – Landing Page
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I am

Jason Osbourne

Jason is a free Elementor layout template that you can use as a personal landing page for your freelance services. 

HAVE PROJECT? LET'S TALK

I focus on one thing

Writing services

Award-Winning​

Add some text here to describe your services to the page visitors.​

Professional​

Add some text here to describe your services to the page visitors.​

Consulting​

Add some text here to describe your services to the page visitors.​

I love life

About Me

In online marketing, a landing page, sometimes known as a "lead capture page" or a "lander", or a "destination page", is a single web page that appears in response to clicking on a search engine optimized search result or an online advertisement.

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Have a project in the works?

LET'S TALK

my story

Skills you can trust

I’ve been trying for months to find a way to build landing pages and sites quickly but customized, without having to sign on to some packaged software solution that makes things easy but predictable, and limited. Save yourself the time and aggravation – just install Elementor and start loving your new page creating freedom. Jane Austin Entrepreneur 400 completed projects

Questions? I have answers

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use this layout for my site?

Definitely, feel free to use it and modify it as you see fit, in personal or commercial projects. No attribution is required, but appreciated.

What do I need in order to set it up

You will need Elementor page builder, a WordPress installation and any WordPress theme. I use GeneratePress in this demo.

I want to turn this layout into a full website

Please get in touch with me to discuss your project needs and define a theme, plugin, and hosting configuration.

I will be happy to help you achieve more with your online presence.

Contact form widget (pro)

Let's talk about your project

If you have the Pro Version of Elementor, you can make use of this Pro Contact frm widget. Otherwise, you may easily use your favourite plugin and embed a form via a shortcode.

item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I am

Jason Osbourne

I am a freelancer who specializes in services that help you and your business grow or get past difficult projects where an extra hand is needed.

HAVE A PROJECT? LET'S TALK

I focus on one thing

Writing services

Award-Winning​

Since primary school I've won every writing contest that I've entered.

Professional​

I always stick to my deadlines and treat my clients with the utmost respect.

Consulting​

Sometimes all you need is just the right advice. I can give you that.

I love life

About Me

Passion is a feeling of intense enthusiasm towards or compelling desire for someone or something. Passion can range from eager interest in or admiration for an idea, proposal, or cause; to enthusiastic enjoyment of an interest or activity; to strong attraction, excitement, or emotion towards a person.

Facebook Twitter Linkedin

Have a project that you need help with?

LET'S TALK

my story

Skills you can trust

I’ve been trying for months to find a way to write content quickly but unique. Save yourself the time and aggravation – just take up on Jason's services and power up your work with great quality content. Jane Austin Entrepreneur 400 completed projects

Questions? I have answers

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use this content for my site?

Definitely, feel free to use it and modify it as you see fit, in personal or commercial projects. No attribution is required, but appreciated.

What do I need in order to get help?

Just head down to the contact form and drop me a message.

I want to make a long term partnership

I usually prefer short term contracts as they provide different challenges but from time to time I take on long term ones. Just write me a message and I’ll let you know.

Contact ME

Let's talk about your project
